overview:
R.J. Friedlander (USA) is an Entrepreneur and Private Investor based in Barcelona, Spain. Currently, he is the CEO of ReviewPro, a web-based (SaaS) social media analytical tool that allows hotels to track, classify and proactively manage their online reputation. Prior to ReviewPro, Friedlander worked for 10 years as a senior executive in one of Spain’s largest media companies most recently as CEO of the business unit that included the group’s digital media and eCommerce companies.

With more than 17 years experience in Internet and technology companies in Europe, the US and Asia, R.J has expertise both as an operating executive and entrepreneur. The projects he has led have generated more than $300 million in revenue.
